question: Which Indian state has won the Digital India Awards for innovative steps in e- governance during pandemic?
explanation:
The Bihar Government took an initiative to transfer financial assistance directly to the accounts of beneficiaries during the COVID-19 pandemic, through its ‘Bihar Sahayata Mobile App’.
For this step, the Chief Minister Secretariat, Disaster Management Department and National Informatics Centre (NIC) of the state have jointly been chosen as winners in the ‘Pandemic category’ Digital India Awards 2020 of the Central Government.
